name: Muntaser Muttaqi
about: Full-stack Developer with over three years of experience in building modern web applications.

experiences.position: Lead Web Engineer, Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained multiple web applications using Laravel and VueJs
Utilized Laravel Eloquent and MySQL to manage database operations and perform complex queries
Implemented responsive and user-friendly interfaces using TailwindCSS and Bootstrap
Utilized Laravel Livewire and InertiaJs to build dynamic and interactive experiences

Utilized Laravel Eloquent and MySQL to manage database operations and perform complex queries
Implemented responsive and user-friendly interfaces using TailwindCSS and Bootstrap
Utilized Laravel Livewire and InertiaJs to build dynamic and interactive experiences

skills.title: Laravel
skills.details: Experienced in building web applications using the Laravel framework. Proficient in implementing controllers, routes, views, and models, and comfortable with Laravel's MVC architecture.

skills.title: Laravel Livewire
skills.details: Experienced in using Laravel Livewire to build dynamic and interactive experiences without writing JavaScript. Proficient in implementing Livewire components, handling events, and implementing reactive data binding.

skills.title: VueJs
skills.details: Skilled in building interactive and dynamic user interfaces using VueJs. Proficient in implementing Vue components, handling events, and implementing reactive data binding.

skills.title: InertiaJs
skills.details: Skilled in using InertiaJs to build full-stack single-page applications (SPAs) using Laravel and VueJs. Proficient in implementing Inertia controllers and routes, and comfortable with Inertia's API-based architecture.

skills.title: AlpineJs
skills.details: Proficient in using AlpineJs to build lightweight and interactive user interfaces. Skilled in implementing Alpine directives and handling events.

skills.title: VanillaJs
skills.details: Experienced in using VanillaJs to build web applications and manipulate the DOM. Proficient in implementing event listeners, handling events, and manipulating DOM elements.

skills.title: TailwindCSS
skills.details: Skilled in using TailwindCSS to build responsive and user-friendly interfaces. Proficient in implementing layout, text, background, and other styles using Tailwind's utility-based approach.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.details: Experienced in using Bootstrap to build responsive and mobile-first interfaces. Proficient in implementing layout, text, background, and other styles using Bootstrap's grid system and pre-designed components.

skills.title: Laravel Eloquent
skills.details: Experienced in using Laravel Eloquent to manage database operations and perform complex queries. Proficient in implementing Eloquent models and relationships, and comfortable with Eloquent's ORM architecture.

skills.title: MySQL
skills.details: Skilled in using MySQL to design and implement database schemas, and perform CRUD operations. Proficient in implementing MySQL queries, indexes, and constraints.

skills.title: Git
skills.details: Experienced in using Git for version control. Proficient in implementing Git commands and workflows, and comfortable with Git's branching and merging model.

educations.degree: BSC in Computer Science and Engineering
Diploma in Computer Science and Technology
